pkgmetadata.longdescription: Permutation Tests for Randomization Model // Perform permutation- based hypothesis testing for randomized experiments as suggested in Ludbrook Dudley (1998) doi:10.2307/2685470 and Ernst (2004) doi:10.1214/088342304000000396, introduced in Pham et al. (2022) doi:10.1016/j.chemosphere.2022.136736.
